name: groovy.vim - Ruley
description: Runs or compiles Groovy scripts.  Indents code blocks.  Continues comments on adjacent lines.  Provides insert-mode abbreviations.  F2 for plugin help.
install_details:
Suggested installation at ~/.vim/ftplugin, or on Windows at <Vim install directory>\vimfiles\ftplugin.

'filetype plugin on' must be specified in .vimrc or _vimrc.

versions.release_notes: Mappings for F4 and F6 fixed.  Indent improved.
